name: Hybrislave
description:
《Hybrislave》 is the first part of Hybrislave developed by "触手折檻部屋" and officially released by BokiBokiGames!
※This is a short story of the prologue, there will be a longer theme story in the future!

◆Story


Once upon a time, the sudden appearance of monsters called "Burana" invaded human territory, and a war between humans and Burana broke out.
Many men were killed and women were raped, but after a long battle, humans finally sealed the gate to the Makai.
However, the losses suffered by various countries were enormous, and they are still struggling to rebuild their countries.
Many areas still lack basic infrastructure, and the Burana that have survived in various places are breeding and continuing to survive...

　――This is the story of a girl living in such a world.

◆Concept


This work mainly depicts a story of "the protagonist being strong and unyielding even after experiencing harsh hardships".

Although this is a very short story, every erotic scene is extreme and relentless!

◆Character Introduction



Raira
The protagonist of this work.
She is a lively and energetic girl.
For some reason, she lives in an orphanage and works hard to solve the problems of the village.
Although she looks no different from humans, she is actually called a "mixed race" and has both human and Burana bloodlines, she hides this fact.


Risha
A nun who manages the orphanage.
For Raira, she is like her older sister.
Since the war with Burana, the subsidy has decreased, and she has had to resort to emergency management.
And her way of earning money is...

◆Game Features

  • Classic RPG game style
  • There are 3 types of Endings
  • Quickly unlock all the erotic scenes in the memory room
